item.title: Adopt A Swimmer NPO | Plettenberg Bay
item.description: At Adopt a Swimmer, we believe that everyone has the power to make a difference, and we do it through one of our greatest loves and life’s most vital skills – swimming! Based in Plettenberg Bay, South Africa
